mapper.update: update role_rel set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify = #{modify,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, role_id, version, modify, modify_time from role_rel
